name: Emax EVOlution
subTitle: (Electrically Driven) 1,000~40,000 min-1 (rpm)
description: Digital display enhances safety and efficiency. Compact and functional design makes the unit portable. Soft-touch switches permit easy operation and long service life.
features: Digital display enhances safety and efficiency
Compact and functional design makes the unit portable
Soft touch switches permit easy operation and long service life
High accuracy, lightweight, high reliability and superior durability
Provides extremely quiet operation from low to high speed with stepless speed adjustment

name: ESPERT 500
subTitle: (Electrically Driven) 1,000~50,000 min-1 (rpm)
description: The ESPERT 500 Brushless Motor takes motor technology to an even higher level. This new state of the art motor has dramatically increased efficiency and torque output. The microprocessor based control unit provides optimal control of the motors and allows for increased flexibility in this multi-function system.
features: Realizes high output power of up to 200W and high durability through the combination of a high-performance brushless DC motor and high grade electronics
Microprocessor controlled for optimal motor control

name: Rotus
subTitle: (Air Driven) 30,000 min-1 (rpm)
description: The ROTUS system is a hand-held grinder with an energy saving air motor. Since it is an air driven system, there is virtually no heat generation resulting in excellent durability. Select from a variety of attachments depending on the application.
features: High torque air motor assembled with special vane mechanism
Two types of air motors can be selected depending on the application
1/4 and 1/15 speed reducers (RG-01, RG-02) can be connected

name: IMPULSE
subTitle: (Air Driven) 60,000 min-1 (rpm)
description: The IMPULSE is a high torque pencil type air grinder. It is a durable and quiet high-efficiency air grinder. The IMPULSE Series offers 45 degree and 90 degree models. Choose the type that best fits your application requirements.
features: Durable and quiet high-efficient air grinder

name: PRESTO II
shortTitle: ULTRA-PRECISION HIGH SPEED AIR TURBINE GRINDER
subTitle: (Air Driven) 320,000 min-1 (rpm)
description: PRESTO II is an ultra high speed non-lube air turbine. It is most suitable for precision processing works such as small precision parts, ceramic, correction of printed circuit board, etc. due to its non-lube handpiece. Flexible tubing ensures excellent workability reducing fatigue to the operator's hand for long continuous use.
features: Most suitable for delicate processing work, utilizing a no lube air turbine handpiece
Ultra-high speed no lube air turbine handpiece ideal for delicate processing applications
Chip air blows away the cutting powder and cools the cutting tool
Built in dust protect mechanism developed by NAKANISHI ensures long durability

name: Sheenus ZERO
subTitle: 19 - 29 KHz
description: The Sheenus ZERO can be used for grinding, polishing and mirror finishing on a wide range of materials from aluminum dies to cemented carbide dies. It is also perfect for plastic molds, press, casting, forging, trimming and header dies. This tool quickly removes hard layers of EDM deposits and polishes difficult areas such as complex corners and ribs. Capabilities include bur removal, grinding and polishing of precision molds, dies electronic and ceramic components.
specifications: UNCLAMP mode Max. 45W, CLAMP mode Max. 20W

name: Sonic Cutter ZERO
subTitle: 38 kHz - 40 kHz
description: The vibration free SONIC CUTTER ensures accurate and sharp cutting finishes. The ergonomic design and easy to maneuver handpiece reduces hand fatigue for long and continuous operation. The output power auto adjusts to the load which provides constant frequency for steady cutting results.
features: Vibration-Free Operation Ensures Accurate and Sharp Cutting Finishes
Ergonomic Design Reduces Hand Fatigue for Long and Continuous Operation
Output Power Auto Adjusts to Load
Constant Frequency Provides Steady Cutting Results
specifications2: screwed the blade W0.16″ x thickness 0.015″
Max. φ0.984 in. x L 6.54 in.

name: iSpeed3
subTitle: 19.05mm (.75”), 20mm, 22mm, 25mm Spindle Dia., 19.05mm Flange, 20mm Flange, 22mm Flange, 60,000 – 80,000RPM, 140 – 150W (.18 - .2HP) Max Power
description: The shorter spindle length is suitable for compact sized automatic CNC lathes. The iSpeed3 Series features sensorless motors and is equipped with super precision hybrid ceramic bearings for longer spindle life.
features: Motor connector attaches directly to the back of the motor/spindle
Spindle accuracy less than 1 micron T.I.R.
machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Electric Spindles for Swiss Machines, Lathes, Specialty Machines, Robots

name: E2000
subTitle: 22.8mm (0.89”) Spindle Dia., 50,000 Max RPM, 200W Max Power
description: The E2000 Series employs a high-speed, ultra-quiet brushless motor. A high-performance system and state of the art design provides high-speed machining and a variety of safety functions.
features: Brushless DC Motor designs for excellent reliability and durability
Air-cooled motor uses a small volume of dry air (1.0 CFM) to minimize heat buildup and allow continuous operation
Wide variety of interchangeable spindles are available
2 motors can be connected (No simultaneous operation)
machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Electric Spindles for Swiss Machines, Lathes, Specialty Machines, Robots

name: E3000
shortTitle: ULTRA PRECISION BRUSHLESS MOTOR AND SPINDLES
subTitle: 20mm (0.79”), 22.8mm (0.89”), 25mm (0.98”), 25.4mm (1”), 30mm (1.18”) Spindle dia., 60,000/80,000rpm Max RPM, 350W (0.47) Max Power

features: Maximum motor output with 350W power supply
Motor connector attaches directly to the back of the motor/spindle
Protection system, external Input/Output control signal
Use E2550 Motor and Spindle with E3000 Control Unit

name: E4000
subTitle: 40mm (1.57”) Spindle Dia., 40,000 Max RPM, 1,200W (1.60HP) Max Power
description: Designed for use on CNC lathes, robots and special application machines for precision milling, drilling, grinding, slitting deburring applications.
features: Extremely low vibration brushless DC motor
Utilizes a double pair of ultra-precision ceramic bearings to obtain high rigidity in both radial and thrust directions. Incorporates 2 ceramic bearings on the front side and 2 on the rear side.

downloads.label: E4000 Safety Relay Box Operation Manual

machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Electric Spindles for Swiss Machines, Lathes, Specialty Machines, Robot

name: MA Series
subTitle: 22.8mm (0.89”) Spindle Dia., 58,000 Max RPM, 108W (0.14HP) Max Power; 25/25.4mm (0.98/1.0”) Spindle Dia., 24,000 Max RPM, 130W (0.17HP) Max Power; 30mm (1.18”) Spindle Dia., 19,000 Max. RPM, 130W (0.17HP) Max Power
description: The MA Series has been designed to operate smoothly at high speeds for long continuous cutting and grinding by connecting an air line kit directly between the air compressor and the air motor. Separate motors and spindles provide flexible application changes. Easy to interchange the components
features: Gang slide NC lathe can be transformed into complex machining centers
Specialized machine design will be made compact and universal
Mounting MA Series on existing equipment can eliminate secondary operations or the equipment can be turned into a special purpose machine
Applicable to secondary operation machines, single purpose machines or special machining and grinding machines
The air motors are explosion proof and do not generate heat even in continuous use
When the MA Series is used at low motor speeds, a speed reducer (AR-01, or other selections) is added to obtain the speed of your choice
A collet, Jacobs Drill Chuck, saw arbor and grinding stone arbor are available for grinding, drilling, milling, slitting, chamfer and deburring operations
machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Pneumatic Spindles for Swiss Machines, Lathes, Specialty Machines, Robots

name: MS Series
subTitle: 19.05-25.4mm (0.75 -1.0”) Spindle Dia., 1,500-30,000 RPM, 130W (0.17HP)
description: A shorter overall length suitable for CNC lathes and special purpose machines. Hardened and precision ground for high rigidity and excellent durability. External one-piece housing includes both the motor and spindle.
features: Outer housing material (SUS416) is precision ground to +0/-0.01mm
Either staight or 90º air connection types are avialable depending on mounting and plumbing restrictions
Very high spindle accuracy makes ultra-precision machining possible
The design of NAKANISHI's air motors gives the highest output power in this small spindle class
Silencer on the exhaust air tubing greatly reduces noise
machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Pneumatic Spindles for Swiss Machines, Lathes, Specialty Machines, Robots

name: HES 510
subTitle: BT/CAT/NT/HSK/R8, 50,000 Max RPM, 340W (0.45HP) Max Power
description: Ultra-precision, high-speed HES510 Spindles allow you to use your existing equipment for a much larger variety of operations. Conventional milling machines and machining centers can now do high-speed machining, small diameter drilling and milling with extremely good surface finishes with the HES510.
features: Best for small diameter drilling and milling
specifications2: Length 13 ft (9249)/ 26 ft (9250); Provided with Air Cooling Hose ø4 mm

description: Ultra-precision, high-speed HES810 Spindles allow you to use your existing equipment for a much larger variety of operations. Conventional milling machines are machining centers can now do high-speed machining, small diameter drilling and milling with extremely good surface finishes with the HES810.
features: Best for small diameter drilling and milling
specifications2: Length 13 ft (9248)/ 19 ft (9249)/ 26 ft (9250); Provided with Air Cooling Hose ø4 mm
machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Electric Spindles for Milling Machines

name: iSpeed5
subTitle: 60,000-80,000 Max RPM, 350W
description: Please contact NSK America Corporation directly for information regarding iSpeed5 for your machine.
features: Fully tool-changeable electric spindles increase machine tool speed.

The iSpeed5 System primarily consists of a motor spindle, stop block, air pressure switch and control unit. Power, cooling air, and control signals are provided to the spindle when engaged to the innovative electromechanical stop block that attaches to your machine tool spindle.
The iSpeed5 is created for continuous lights out manufacturing even in the case of cutting fluids and coolants.
The internal air passage allows the pressurization and cooling of the system while preventing the entry of contaminants into the stop block.
machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Electric Spindles for Milling Machines

name: HPS
shortTitle: FULLY TOOL CHANGEABLE AIR MOTOR SPINDLES
subTitle: BT30/CAT40, 25,000 RPM or 50,000 RPM
specifications: For grinding wheel with I.D. of ø5 mm
specifications2: For grinding wheel with I.D. of ø5 mm
machiningSpindlesCategory: Fully Tool Changeable High-Speed Air Motor Spindles

name: HTS
subTitle: Straight 20mm BT/HSK, 150,000 Max RPM
description: The HTS Series' high-speed operation is suitable for cutting tool diameters of less than R0.5mm in reference to ball end mills. It has negligible spindle expansions. The air turbine mechanism has extremely low heat generation. Cutting tool depth of cut is up to R x 0.1 mm. Very high feed rates are also possible. Highly stable milling conditions can be achieved even with very small diameter cutting tools.
machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Air Turbine Spindles for Milling Machines

name: Planet
features: Turns a milling machine into a jig grinding machine and a lathe into an internal grinding machine.
An adapted air exhaust system keeps noise to a minimum.
Excellent performance at a relatively low cost.
When mounted in a turning center, the PLANET 600 can be used as a precision internal grinder.
Can be used as a high speed grinder in specialty built machines.
Collets ranging from 0.5mm thru 6.35mm are available to accommodate all of the most common tool shanks.
Special built-in high-speed bearings withstand extended periods of operation.
machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Air Turbine Spindles for Milling Machines

name: Xpeed
features: Ideal for extremely high precision, small diameter machining applications

Air bearings use compressed air blown into a small gap between the spindle and the bearing surface. The spindle floats on an even cushion of compressed air. The non-contact type of bearing means the spindle has a very long service life because of low friction and wear; it also means that the spindle generates almost no heat or vibration.
The spindle and bearing are finished with a very high-accuracy process to ensure extremely low vibration and very high rotating accuracy.
machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Air Turbines with Air Bearing

name: ABT
features: Ideal for extremely high precision, small diameter machining applications.

Air bearings use compressed air blown into a small gap between the spindle and the bearing surface. The spindle floats on an even cushion of compressed air. This non-contact type of bearing means the spindle has a very long service life because of low friction and wear; it also means that the spindle generates almost no heat or vibration.
The spindle and bearing are finished with a very high-accuracy process to ensure extremely low vibration and very high rotating accuracy.

The ABT Series are equipped with a Rotational Speed Detection Sensor. When in operation, a digital pulse signal representing the RPM can be output. The rotation speed and load condition can be monitored using a high performance, locally available speed meter.
specifications: Proper Air Pressure for Air Bearing
Proper Air Pressure for Air Turbine
Radial : Less than 20N; Thrust : Less than 35N; (Bearing Air supply pressure 80 PSI)
Less than ø2.0 mm (For ø4.0 mm shank)
Bearing supply ø6 mm (1 location); Turbine Air supply ø6 mm (2 locations)
Rotational Speed Detection Sensor with 5 meter cable
machiningSpindlesCategory: High-Speed Air Turbines with Air Bearing
